name: Forgotten File
description:
You are the representative of "Ark0i Games"!

Your new game Mad Dream will be on sale today.

What is this when everything is going so well!?

The most important file of the game was forgotten in the office and there is no one in the office!

The CEO called you and told you to bring your file right away!

Although there is a very long distance between the Office and the Shop!

But you know a good shortcut but it's kinda dangerous there

You can still do it!

Task :

Send your file to the CEO

Made in Azerbaijan
